name: Full Day Huacachina  Tour From Lima
description: Around 10:30AM arrival to Ica and reception at the bus stops and then begins the visit one of the most popular vineyards as known as "bodegas vitivinicolas" where you will see, learn and taste the Peruvian drink as known as Pisco (grape brandy) and of course you can taste many kind of local wine produced by the farmers using ancient artesian methods, visit the historical center of Ica.
